title: #1466 It's Nice To Know What Works
itunes:title: #1466 It's Nice To Know What Works
description:
Today's show begins with a conversation about Dr. Drew damaging the new studio console with his doodling. The guys then take a call about addressing people by their proper pronouns, as well as the FDA approval of the Pfizer vaccine. From there, Ace and Drew talk with callers about being a new dad,  and Love Boat conspiracy theories. As the show wraps up, the guys look back on a hilarious Man Show clip. 

Please Support Our Sponsors:
JustWorks.com
Lifelock.com, promo code ADAM
Pluto TV
